title: how to keep outlook folders when adding outlook account to thunderbolt
content:
Hello, I've installed Thunderbolt and added my Outlook account. However, none of the folders I created in Outlook have been copied over. Only the standard built-in folders e.g inbox, junk, sent etc were setup in Thunderbolt with all the mail from the other folders in the inbox. This is not very helpful.

How do I set up the Thunderbolt account so that the folders (and contents) are matched with the folders (and contents) in Outlook? Thanks
creator: ayyaesika

title: supporting thunderbird
content:
Hi. I donate 20 bucks a month to Thunderbird. Love it.

Was wondering if there is a way to disable the "support thunderbird" pop ups that always occur upon launch.

Much obliged.

title: Incoming mails are not downloaded
content:
Since 15th May 2025, some of our employees PCs cannot download incoming e-mails. PC conditions (such as security condition, etc) are the same before and after 15th May 2025.

E-mails can be downloaded if I delete current account and again add the account.

However, in some of PCs, some certain e-mails can not be downloard although most of the e-mail can be downloaded.

I do not find any problem in e-mail server itself.

I doubt an problem in an installed Thunderbird software.
creator: yoshihiro.kori

title: Sent messages showin in my inbox
content: When I send an email why is it appearing in my inbox after sending? In account settings I have only ticked When sending messages, automatically: Place a copy in: "Sent" Folder on:

title: Thunderbird self deleting
content: I discovered today that much of what I had saved in Drafts has disappeared. Where can they be recovered? Why did you choose that for me without letting me say no thanks? Elsewhere you were asking about control. Real basic to feeling one has any control is things staying as you left them.

title: corrispondenti
content: Ciao utilizzo thunderbird per leggere la mia pec la mia pec è personale: claudio.diloreto@pec.it non capisco perché nel campo "Corrispondenti" compare sempre l'indirizzo dell'assistenza informatica dove lavoro. le domande sono: 1) Come ci è finito lì? 2) perché? 3) soprattutto: non ho tovato documentazione on line CHIARA su cosa sia il corrispondente, su come si configura etc etc. 4) il CED sta leggendo le mie pec? Grazie e complimenti per il vostro lavoro. In allegato uno screenshot

title: address book import
content:
I exported Outlook Contacts to a .csv file and imported giberish to the Thunderbird Personal Address book. Can the giberish be block deleted? How should the Outlook Contacts be transferred to Thunderbird? Secondly, I exported Outlook Contacts to gmail and have used them on the web based gmail app to send messages. Don't remeber how the gmail contacts got to the Thunderbird Address book, but they don't work. The first message I sent from Thunderbird from my wife's gmail address to my hotmail address produced the following error:

Sending of the message failed. An error occurred while sending mail. The mail server responded: The recipient address <Steve Thompson (sthompson2486@hotmail.com> is not a valid RFC 5321 address. For more information, go to 

https://support.google.com/a/answer/3221692 and review RFC 5321

specifications. 00721157ae682-70ca8508772sm13401897b3.82 - gsmtp. Please check the message recipient ""Steve Thompson (sthompson2486"@hotmail.com" and try again.

Both imported address books are unuseable. Please help.
creator: stevet2486

title: Account Folders
content: I attempted to create a new folder under my primary account, something I have done over and over without a problem. This time, however, the folder appeared in italics and was grayed out and had a sub folder which contained the partial name of one of my other folders, and both were empty. In addition, a couple of folders disappeared, but their emails appeared in other folders. The emails from at least one of the disappeared folders, are missing. However, if I do a global search for the email address of any of those messages, they all appear in the results window. I just don't know where they are. I have attempted to track this down and implement a couple of different solutions but I fear digging deeper is going to get me in trouble and I will lose these emails. I know this narrative sounds somewhat disjointed, but this behavior is beyond my comprehension. Does anyone understand what is going on and how I can correct this?
creator: kljecoc
